Hi Bob, 
You can learn about how the City of Arlington allows departments to maintain their own department social media pages in this document. icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/105221
You can also read what local government officials think is the best way to create facebook pages for local government departments.http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/kn/Question/21750
I hope you find these resources useful. If you are looking for something else please comment on my answer so I can help you find different resources. 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org
